explains: adj. 专注的，专心致志的；坚决的；急切的
wordGroup: intent on 专心致志于；抱定决心要实行
letter of intent n. 意向书；合同之草约

sentences.en: His intent is clearly not to placate his critics.
sentences.cn: 他的目的显然不是要安抚批评他的人。

sentences.en: I was so intent on my work that I didn't notice the time.
sentences.cn: 我专心工作，以致忘了时间。
他的目光突然专注起来。
